name: Air Residences
cardAddress: Corner Yakal and Malugay Streets, Brgy San Antonio, Makati City
cardDescription: Nothing says you've made it quite like a Makati Address. Like a jet plane in flight, Air soars above the sky with Makati City as its runway.
bannerAbout: Meaningful relationships. Career opportunities. Personal well-being. Together, they spell out the story of your success, and it all begins at SMDC Premier’s Air Residences.
bannerFeatures: Generator Set for Common Areas and select residential outlets
Provision for Telecom and Cable Providers

grandLobby.title: Grand Lobby
grandLobby.description: Welcome your guests in a spectacular fashion. Invite friends and colleagues to any of the elegantly furnished function rooms and lounges, beginning with the grand lobby. Residents and guests are treated to a stylish and sophisticated ambiance to make the important first impression.

feature.title: The doorstep to success
feature.description: Located in the heart of Makati, one of Metro Manila’s largest and most prosperous central business districts, Air Residences puts you in the right place to make your mark and find the success you’re looking for.

amenity.title: Amenities
amenity.description: Retreat in luxurious comfort to the two-level amenity deck that features sophisticated pavilions and terraces. Host barbecue or pool parties and enjoy dining alfresco amidst lush gardens and open spaces. Unwind while lounging on the sundeck or simply take a dip into the pool to invigorate the senses.

unit.title: Units
unit.description: Air Residences contains a wide array of different unit types to fit your needs. Choose from studio units, 1-bedroom units, and 2-bedroom units with or without a balcony to maximize your use of space and get the most out of your investment.

name: Bloom Residences
cardAddress: Sucat Paranaque
cardDescription: Bloom Residences in Paranaque is home-sweet home that's luxuriously comfortable. Strategically located in Sucat, everything you'll ever need is right within your reach.
bannerAbout: Have a glimpse of the life lived in glitz and glamour, with gold curtain walls that surround this luminescent development. Inspired by the entertainment industry's zest for recognition, Fame Residences stands proud as the crowning glory of Central EDSA. A trophy providing a true sense of prominence to its residents.

grandLobby.title: Grand Lobby
grandLobby.description: Let our warmhearted staff tend our sprouting community so you can focus on flourishing. Expect a lush, grand welcome from Bloom Residences' luxurious hotel-like lobbies, while our generous staff will treat you like our own family.

feature.title: Let life blossom in Parañaque
feature.description: With its safe environment and an inviting neighborhood, Bloom Residences makes for a great place to build your budding career or start a family and raise children of your own.

amenity.title: Amenities
amenity.description: Bloom Residences provides a haven for urbanities and young families who want to stay active and healthy through multitude of recreational amenities. Residents can enjoy a dynamic lifestyle all year round! To promote fitness and wellness to its residents, Bloom Residences provides various meditation and fitness activities through its amenities.

unit.title: Units
unit.description: Recharge in the comfort of your home after a swim or your family jog. Bloom residences offers pleasant yet cosmopolitan units for your much-needed rest and relaxation.

type.name: 2 Bedroom End Unit with Mezzanine and Balcony

grandLobby.title: Lobby
grandLobby.description: Find wonderful facilities, services, and people that elicit the same smiles that greet you all the way from our front door to yours.

feature.title: Start fresh
feature.description: As the first vertical development of its kind in Marilao, Bulacan, Cheer Residences offers a fresh perspective to the condominium lifestyle. In addition to the first-rate amenities made available to all residents, this luxurious yet still affordable home also offers access to its own mall within the complex for unparalleled convenience.

amenity.title: Amenities
amenity.description: A happier home equals a happier you! Explore first-rate amenities and spaces designed for your pleasure and satisfaction.

unit.title: Model Unit
unit.description: The search for happiness ends here at Cheer Residences, a luxurious and affordable home for those who seek comfort, delight, and fulfillment!

name: Coast Residences
cardAddress: Roxas Blvd. corner Dapitan St. Pasay City
cardDescription: This exquisite condo development has set the standard for leisure with its choicest amenities and features.
bannerAbout: New views await you at Coast Residences, the newest SMDC Premier Development. Situated in Roxas Boulevard, Coast Residences gives grand views of the Manila Bay Sunset and the Metro Manila Cityscape. With a stunning exterior design and interiors inspired by Bali's top hotels, Coast Residences gives you a new view on premier condo living.

grandLobby.title: Grand Lobby
grandLobby.description: The opulent lobby, with its granite porcelain floors, ambient-mood lighting, inspired design details, and friendly front desk service redefines luxury living while providing a warm welcome to residents and guests.

feature.title: Surrounded by dynamic culture
feature.description: Lovers of culture and picturesque views will love living in Coast Residences! The Cultural Center of the Philippines stands a few minutes away and hosts performances including plays, ballet, musicals, opera, and more. Historical galleries, studios, and exhibits can be found in Intramuros. There is also the sunset off Manila Bay to enjoy while walking on the boardwalk.

amenity.title: Amenities
amenity.description: Coast Residences has an exclusive Sunset Lounge with a Game Room on the 41st floor are designed with floor-to-ceiling windows allowing natural light to fill the spaces. Coast Residences embraces the full beauty of its waterfront location with a breathtaking pool and view deck facing Manila Bay.

unit.title: Model Unit
unit.description: Choose from Studio, 1 Bedroom, 2 Bedroom, and Family Suites units. Coast Residences' Family Suites come with flexi areas convertible to a home office for your start-up business, a nursery room for your first born child or an entertainment room for the entire family.

name: Cool Suites at Wind Residences
cardAddress: Brgy. Maharlika West, Tagaytay City, Cavite
cardDescription: With SMDC's signature 5-star amenities, it is a perfect holiday home for those who enjoy the cool wind of Tagaytay.
bannerAbout: Cool Suites is the newest garden complex in the flourishing Wind Residences estate. Nestled inside the complex is an array of lush foliage and greenery that serve as a private retreat where you can relax and recover from the busy work week. With SMDC’s signature 5-star amenities, it is a perfect holiday home for those who enjoy the cool wind of Tagaytay
bannerFeatures: Commercial Strip at the Ground Floor (Tower A)
Standby Generator Set for Common Areas & Select Unit Outlets

grandLobby.title: Grand Lobby
grandLobby.description: Fall in love with Cool Suites with its charming modern country home-inspired tower lobby. Using natural elements combined with a warm fire place, the ambiance become cozier and more romantic.

feature.title: A Volcano and Lake View
feature.description: Surrounded by gorgeous views of the mountains, Taal Lake, and Taal Volcano, Cool Suites in Tagaytay City lets you enjoy the beauty of nature alongside the cool breezes that sweep through.

amenity.title: Amenities
amenity.description: At Cool Suites, enjoy intimate getaways as you unwind surrounded by sprawling garden. Relish moments to recharge- a heart picnic, a peaceful stroll, a refreshing jog or a restful moment under a tree. Truly a place to replenish your soul.

unit.title: Units
unit.description: Your perfect getaway from the city. A cool sanctuary that makes every day feel like a five-star vacation.

name: Field Residences
cardAddress: Dr. A. Santos Ave. Barangay San Dionisio, Paranaque City
cardDescription: Designed for utmost relaxation and convenience in mind, Field Residences' strategic location, wide open spaces and generously sized amenities offers families spaces to thrive and grow.
bannerAbout: Field Residences offers five star sub urban living south of the metro. From young to growing families, Field Residences offers a wide array of living options suited for your needs and lifestyles. Relax and bond with your loved ones at the development’s host of excellent amenities. For convenience, SM Sucat is right in front of your home and international and local airports are right nearby. Dining and shopping options abound as the Entertainment City is a short drive away. Designed for utmost relaxation and convenience in mind, Field Residences’ strategic location, wide open spaces and generously sized amenities offers families spaces to thrive and grow.
bannerFeatures: Standby Generator Set for Common Areas & Select Unit Outlets

grandLobby.title: Grand Lobby
grandLobby.description: Fitting of home that adapts to you, Field Residences’ grand lobby stands ever-ready to welcome you home. Carefully-chosen furniture pieces create a comforting setting that is just as inviting to your guests as it is to you.

feature.title: A home that adapts to you
feature.description: Located just south of the metro, Field Residences in Sucat, Parañaque offers sublime suburban living that adapts to your lifestyle, whether you’re independent, a newlywed couple, an OFW family, or just looking for a change of scenery. Nearby highlights include SM City Sucat, the international and domestic airport terminals of NAIA, and Entertainment City.

amenity.title: Amenities
amenity.description: Field Residences' amenities include an enclosed clubhouse and poolside area for events, a children's area, 3 kiddie pools, 3 wading pools, an open playfield, 3 25m lap pools, themed gardens, and a picnic area.

unit.title: Units
unit.description: Configured to include a plethora of living options that suits your needs today, it is designed to meet your ever-evolving lifestyle. Whatever stage of life you’re in, Field Residences sets the stage for better things to come.

amenity.description: Lane Residences is designed with lush greenery and multiple open spaces to create a calming atmosphere, perfect for leisure. Have a picnic, play with your family at the playground, take a stroll, play a pick-up game of basketball, or lounge at the clubhouse.

unit.title: Units
unit.description: Design your home to your heart's desire with our flexi units. Enjoy the freedom of combining units, allocating rooms, and maximizing space to fit your taste.

name: Leaf Residences
cardAddress: Susana Ave, Tunasan, Muntinlupa, Metro Manila
cardDescription: Let nature nurture your family at Leaf Residences. With its unique design reminiscent of a tropical rainforest getaway, it offers the first taste of condominium living surrounded by all the greenery sought after in the South.
bannerAbout: Let nature nurture your family at Leaf Residences. With its unique design reminiscent of a tropical rainforest getaway, it offers the first taste of condominium living surrounded by all the greenery sought after in the South. It's the perfect home for families looking to be one with nature.

grandLobby.title: Grand Lobby
grandLobby.description: Upon entering, you are greeted by a magnificent, green lobby akin to that of a luxury hotel. Admire the scenery as you walk through or lounge about at your own leisure. You are always welcome at the grand lobby.

feature.title: Be one with nature
feature.description: Located in Susana Heights, Muntinlupa, Leaf Residences creates the perfect atmosphere to let nature nurture your family. Natural flora, cool and crystal-clear pools, and outdoor lounge areas provide a refreshing break from the troubles of modern life. When you need to return, the commercial development built into the property ensures you never need to go far.

amenity.title: Amenities
amenity.description: Enjoy the refreshing feeling only nature can provide. Take a relaxing stroll amongst the greenery. Take a soothing dip in the pool. Relax at the outdoor lounge areas. Everything comes together to give you and your family comfort like no other.

unit.title: Units
unit.description: Live comfortably in a unit designed to make your family feel at home. Leaf Residences offers smart spaces that you can customize to your liking. Combine bedrooms or units to suit your needs and give your family the room it needs to grow. With the customization options, modern facilities, and amenities all within reach, you can enjoy unparalleled convenience.

name: Light Residences
cardAddress: EDSA corner Madison St., Mandaluyong City
cardDescription: For those who find shopping irresistible, Light Residences has its very own Light Mall. Enjoy spur-of-the-moment movie dates in any of its digital cinemas, or do a quick stop at its own Savemore Market
bannerAbout: For those who rejoice in a fast-paced lifestyle where convenience and ease are prized, Light Residences brings you to the center of the action. Located along EDSA and Madison Street, it sits at an advantageous location, linked to BONI-EDSA MRT where you can access any point of Manila. Decked out in urban conveniences, Light Residences is a joy to live in. For those who find shopping irresistible, Light Residences has its very own Light Mall. Enjoy spur-of-the-moment movie dates in any of its digital cinemas, or do a quick stop at its own Savemore Market
bannerFeatures: Automatic Fire Detection and Alarm System

feature.title: Be at the center of the action
feature.description: Decked out in urban conveniences, Light Residences is a joy to live in! Located along EDSA and Madison Street, it rises in an advantageous location connected to the Boni MRT-3 Station and the EDSA highway which in turn leads to any point in Metro Manila. Here, shopping and entertainment come easy, thanks to built-in Light Mall.

amenity.title: Amenities
amenity.description: Light Residences' amenities include a grand lobby, swimming pools, function rooms, fitness center, jogging path, cabanas, and landscaped gardens.

name: Light2 Residences
cardAddress: EDSA Corner Madison Street Mandaluyong City
cardDescription: Located along the Mandaluyong stretch of EDSA, Light 2 Residences is sure to be an iconic landmark that shines brightly along this vital thoroughfare.
bannerAbout: Located along the Mandaluyong stretch of EDSA, Light 2 Residences is sure to be an iconic landmark that shines brightly along this vital thoroughfare.

grandLobby.title: Grand Lobby

feature.title: Shine brightly
feature.description: Light 2 is built along the Mandaluyong stretch of EDSA, standing out as an iconic landmark that shines brightly especially at night. Its strategic location gives it easy access to roads leading to major central business districts and the international and domestic airport terminals. As a further convenience, it has a direct connection to an MRT-3 station.

amenity.title: Amenities
amenity.description: With tons of space for play and relaxation, find opportunities to meet and mingle and make new friends. Dive into relaxation or do laps for exercise at the adult pool. Kids will also enjoy splashing around the children’s pool. Hit the well-furnished gym after the office to work off the day’s stress.

unit.title: Units

amenity.title: Amenities

Have an invigorating workout at the fitness gym or take a refreshing swim amidst a sanctuary of lush greeneries for a revitalized body and mind.

unit.title: Units

The modern and relaxing environment will definitely lift your spirits after a long day at work.

amenity.title: Amenities

amenity.title: Amenities

grandLobby.description: Start conversations and make new friends or catch up with your existing ones at Zeal Residences’ welcoming lobby lounge.

feature.title: Live your life with zest!
feature.description: With an integrated retail strip and an array of recreational amenities, you can embrace a life full of glee at Zeal Residences.

amenity.title: Amenities
amenity.description: Experience the pleasure that comes with a complete collection of modern amenities all thoughtfully-designed to encourage activity and neighborly engagements!

unit.title: Units
unit.description: Wake up to joyful mornings in your own space surrounded by lush greenery, an inviting atmosphere, and a warm, peaceful community.
